DOC.brief_summary: ISIS- ICD study design evaluate impact PARAD+ algorithm inappropriate shock , general population implant primary secondary prevention dual tri chamber device one year follow-up
DOC.brief_title: Inappropriate Shock Reduction wIth PARAD+ Rhythm DiScrimination
DOC.detailed_description: The primary endpoint demonstrate 95 % patient implanted PARAD+ algorithm free inapproporiate shock compare 92.5 % general ICD population .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient eligible implantation ( accord current accepted guideline , schedule implant ( primoimplant , replacement , upgrade ) Paradym/Paradym RF ( CRTD DRICD ) within next 30 day , already implant within last 30 day 2 . Patient sinus rhythm , patient paroxysmal atrial tachyarrhythmia patient persistent atrial tachyarrhythmia cardioversion plan within three month 1 . Any contraindication ICD therapy 2 . Atrial lead implant 3 . Patient permanent atrial tachyarrhythmia 4 . Patients implant ventricular assist device ( VAD )
